name: InfosetMemberDescription

properties.name: name
properties.description: The name of this value, which becomes a property of the parent Infoset object.

properties.name: type
properties.description: The data type for values accessed through the name property of the parent Infoset object.
properties.longdesc: One of: Boolean, String, Number, Icon (16x16), BitmapData (a BitmapData object), SizeInBytes, Date, Array (an array of type for any of these types: nested arrays are not allowed).

description: Associates a data type with a single node-data value for Adobe Bridge nodes.
longdesc:
Each node-data value is a member of anInfoset object associated with an ExtensionHandler object.
The name becomes a property of the parent Infoset object, which provides access to a data value of this type.
